summary: REQ-30 appears implemented via enhanced visuals/animations in AccessCodeGate plus new supporting CSS. REQ-29 likely implemented (TikTok/Instagram links preserved), but the diff is truncated before the bottom of PractitionerAuthority.tsx so full verification that the banner block is removed is not possible from provided evidence. Some global styling/motif additions in index.css appear broader than the requested access-gate refinement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Aurora Arcana banner image rendering from the PractitionerAuthority section so no banner is displayed at the bottom of the section.
missing_requirements.reason: PractitionerAuthority.tsx diff is truncated before the bottom of the component; the provided snippet shows headshot + social links + bio text, but does not include the prior bottom banner area, so we cannot confirm from the diff summary alone that the bottom banner block was removed or is no longer rendered.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader global typography and esoteric motif utilities (e.g., grain/moon/star overlays, shimmer animation) added to global CSS beyond the access-code gate visual refinement.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-30 asks to refine the access-code gate entry page visuals; the diff shows multiple global style additions (typography changes and general-purpose motif utilities) that are not explicitly scoped to the access gate and could affect other pages/sections.
